name: Doll Factory
description:
Doll Factory is more of a vibe than a game. I wanted to experiment with some Unity features that I hadn't really worked with before, and prototyped this out over the weekend. Made for the Halloween 2019 Tasting Room jam.

Very very short, more of a learning experience than anything. Use Alt+F4 to close the game. Works with either a mouse and keyboard or controller.

Concrete floor texture from Wild Textures
